Class DigesterCRC16

java.lang.Object
br.com.codesolver.digester.DigesterCRC16
All Implemented Interfaces:
Digester, DigesterCRC
public class DigesterCRC16 extends Object implements DigesterCRC
Calcula um HASH do tipo CRC-16.
Since:
2025-08-26
Author:
Luciano Vieira Rodrigues
